summary: A mod to make Skyrim werewolves more similar to Morrowind werewolves in stats, this mod is intended for people who either can\'t afford Dawnguard for whatever reason or don\'t have it yet. This mod adds passive muffle to werewolf form, makes werewolves much much faster, and buffs werewolf damage, and health.
descriptionHtml:
With this mod werewolves over level 50 have had their damage output more than doubled, and werewolves at all levels including lower levels. do significantly more damage than they used to do. Also all werewolves have 555 additional health, after being unsure if making the player health doubled is possible, I decided 555+ would be an acceptable intermediate amount.  Although if anyone knows how to simply double it, I\'d appreciate being told if it\'s possible, and how.

Also the werewolf running speed has been drastically increased, and werewolves should now walk silently. This mod is compatible with mods that alter werewolf animations or skins, as well as compatible with werewolf loot, although I am unsure how compatible it is with other werewolf mods.

Installation: Just extract the ESP to data, then check the ESP when you next play Skyrim.
author: Lectra
